item.title: ðŸ”´ 00:28 Air alert in Ternopil region. Follow further messages.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 00:28 Air alert in Ternopil region. Follow further messages. #Ternopil_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: ðŸ”´ 21:57 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
